```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r load  echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```


```{r map}

msIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft#/media/File:Microsoft_logo_(2012).svg",
  iconWidth = 38, iconHeight = 95,
  iconAnchorX = 22, iconAnchorY = 94
)

myMap<- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat=47.3831,lng=237.93,popup="Microsoft",icon=msIcon)
myMap
```
